name: Purple Legion
description:
Made in 72h for Ludum Dare 51

In purple legion you must defend yourself against a legion of little purple creatures ! If one of them reach the other side of the map, it’s game over ! Every entities will perform an action every 10 seconds at the end of the timer at the top of the screen as indicated by the arrows on the ground (yellow = movement, red = attack)

To defend yourself you have at the beginning acces to a small fireball that deal 1 damage in selected tile, when you manage to kill ennemies, you earn experience and you advance in the levels, at each new level you can choose either a new ability or to enhance one of your existing ones (you'll have two choices every time).

The game is endless, try to survive as long as you can !
